alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Florence, Dillon, northern Marion and southeastern Marlboro Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 734 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms between Brownsville and Oak Grove, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and a quick one-half to 1 inch of rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Latta, Lake View, Sellers, Fork, Zion, Hamer, Brownsville, Oak Grove, South Of The Border, Bingham, Floydale, Smithboro, Kemper, Little Rock and Mcleod Medical Center. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 175 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
